name: Adhesive Bandages
description: Various sizes of adhesive bandages for covering small wounds and cuts.

name: Antiseptic Wipes
description: Alcohol or iodine-based wipes for disinfecting wounds.

name: Antibiotic Ointment
description: Ointment to prevent infection in minor cuts, scrapes, and burns.

name: Sterile Gauze Pads
description: Pads for covering and protecting larger wounds.

name: Medical Tape
description: Tape for securing bandages and gauze pads.

name: Tweezers
description: Tool for removing splinters and foreign objects.

name: Scissors
description: Scissors for cutting bandages, tape, and gauze.

name: Thermometer
description: Device for measuring body temperature.

name: First Aid Manual
description: Guide for administering basic first aid.

name: Instant Cold Pack
description: Pack for reducing swelling and pain by applying cold.

name: Instant Heat Pack
description: Pack for providing warmth to sore muscles or joints.

name: Elastic Bandage
description: Bandage for wrapping sprains and strains.

name: CPR Mask
description: Mask for performing CPR with a barrier to prevent contact with the patient's mouth.

name: Disposable Gloves
description: Gloves for maintaining hygiene while treating wounds.

name: Hydrocortisone Cream
description: Cream for reducing inflammation and itching.

name: Burn Cream
description: Cream for soothing and treating minor burns.

name: Eye Wash
description: Solution for flushing out foreign particles from the eyes.

name: Alcohol Pads
description: Pads soaked in alcohol for sanitizing hands and equipment.

name: Tongue Depressors
description: Wooden sticks for pressing down the tongue during a throat examination.

name: Elastic Medical Bandage
description: Bandage used for support and compression of injured areas.
